/opt/homebrew/opt/llvm/bin/clang++  -arch arm64 -isysroot /Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/SDKs/MacOSX15.2.sdk -Wl,-search_paths_first -Wl,-headerpad_max_install_names CMakeFiles/my_vulkan_engine.dir/src/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/my_vulkan_engine.dir/src/engine.cpp.o -o my_vulkan_engine  -Wl,-rpath,/Users/mukesh/VulkanSDK/1.3.296.0/macOS/lib /Users/mukesh/VulkanSDK/1.3.296.0/macOS/lib/libvulkan.dylib /opt/homebrew/lib/libglfw.3.dylib
